Journal policy quote: "PLOS ONE uses peer review to determine whether a paper is technically sound and worthy of inclusion in the published scientific record. Once the work is published in PLOS ONE
column6: the broader community is then able to discuss and evaluate the significance of the article"

Journal policy quote: "It is journal policy to publish work deemed by peer reviewers to be a coherent and sound addition to scientific knowledge and to put less emphasis on interest levels
column6: provided that the research constitutes a useful contribution to the field."
